chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
Question. Chapter nineteen.

Can someone point out where, in either the Old or New Testament, or within the six synodal councils, it is instructed to create images or to worship those that already exist?
chunks.original_latin:
INTERROGATIO. CAP. XIX. Ut scientes nos faciant, ubi in Veteri
vel Novo Testamento, aut in sex synodalibus conciliis
jubeantur imagines facere, vel factas adorare.
